agreement_COD_STATE: select codeval2 CODEVal, codeval2 CODETxt from jsharmony.ucod2_country_state where codeval1='USA' and (codetdt is null or (codetdt is not null and codetdt > getdate())) order by codseq,codeval2
agreement_COD_MONTH: select MTH as CODEVal,MTH as CODETxt from jsharmony.V_MONTHS order by N
agreement_COD_YEAR: select YR as CODEVal,YR as CODETxt from jsharmony.V_YEARS order by YR
agreement_sign: update C set C_ATstmp=getdate() where C_ID=@C_ID;
insert into RQST(RQST_SOURCE, RQST_ATYPE, RQST_ANAME, RQST_PARMS) values('CLIENT', 'REPORT', 'AGREEMENT',@RQST_PARMS);
insert into RQST_D(RQST_ID, D_SCOPE, D_SCOPE_ID, D_CTGR, D_Desc) values(@RQST_ID, 'C',@C_ID, 'AGREEMNT', 'Customer Portal Agreement');
agreement_paymentresult: select PACC_STS,PACC_PP_Result,C_PRE.C_ID,C_PRE.PE_ID,NEW_CLIENT_Result,PE_LL_Tstmp from C_PRE left outer join CPE on C_PRE.PE_ID=CPE.PE_ID where C_PRE_ID=@payment_id and PACC_fp_hash=@fp_hash;
agreement_COD_C_ID: select C_ID as CODEVal,C_Name as CODETxt from C where 1=1 %%%DATALOCKS%%% order by C_Name
agreement_report_N: select N.C_ID,N_TYPE,N_EU,format(N_ETstmp,'MM/dd/yyyy') as N_ETstmp,N_Note from N inner join C on C.C_ID=N.C_ID where N.C_ID=@C_ID %%%DATALOCKS%%%
